entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
